synopsis.text: After being forgotten by the King on their special day, a charming, chocolate-loving android named Chocola leaves the grand castle behind in search of a new life. Heartbroken and determined, she ventures into the mysterious forest, where she encounters a notorious band of misfits known as the Smashers, led by the enigmatic Widoshiku. Meanwhile, Princess Kyoko of the Groen Kingdom on Earth yearns for a normal life, but her dreams are tied to awakening her comatose twin sister, Ui. To achieve this, she must gather all the strangers, but her journey is fraught with unexpected adversaries. As these two stories intertwine, Chocola must decide if she can forge a new path with her bandit companions or if her past will catch up with her. Originally premiered at the Ribon Otanoshimi Anime Matsuri in 2001, this captivating tale of love, self-discovery, and adventure promises to keep viewers enthralled.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
